column6: Hope is lost.  Literally-lost in time, with Cable stranded in the future, unable to travel back to save her. For the first time in Hope's short life, the so-called "mutant messiah" has to fend for herself... and now she's hiding out in a futuristic city born of the ashes of Cable's greatest enemy, Stryfe. Rated T  ...$2.99
column8: | editor:Axel Alonso | letterer:Joe Caramagna | inker:Paul Gulacy | colorist:Thomas Mason | writer:Duane Swierczynski | penciller (cover):Dave Wilkins
